content: Saying goodbye to Japan with a full heart. Excited to return to NYC and bring a piece of this vibrant culture with me, but also a bit nervous about how to blend these experiences. Let's see what unfolds in the Big Apple!
raw_content: "Saying goodbye to Japan with a full heart. Excited to return to NYC and bring a piece of this vibrant culture with me, but also a bit nervous about how to blend these experiences. Let's see what unfolds in the Big Apple! 🇯🇵✨ #NYC #CulturalExchange"
